reviewText: Used this in my business class.  Great discussion generator.

My 7th and 8th grade students loved watching this. I created a worksheet for accountability, but, they really enjoyed watching how Nike operates. They love the sneakers and were fascinated with the work that goes behind the image, manufacturing and marketing.
I used this DVD for my PR class; works better for a marketing atmosphere. A illite over An hour in run time.
A good look at Nike.  The video does a good job showing the impact of outsourcing and sweatshop labor on the US and SE Asia.

A wide range of topics covered which made Nike a successful business: From its beginnings creating the running shoe out of a waffle machine, sports stars endorsements, to all of the challenges they had to overcome such as the lost trends as Skateboarding and the child labor negative news.

Cool video that explains the story of nike with a lot of Michael Jordan footage (the reason they are who they are today).  You get to see Nike headquarters and a lot of the business aspect of the company. Just cool if your a fan of Nike.
